title: Ashton's Taste of Excellence with Andy Green!
itunes:title: Ashton's Taste of Excellence with Andy Green!
description: Andy Green from Ashton Cigars joins Dave Garofalo & Mr Jonathan for a Taste of Excellence! T.O.E. is an Almond Joy, sipping rum, and a La Aroma de Cuba Mi Amor Cigar. The perfect combination of flavor! In the second hour we're joined by Joe Cusano from Cusano Cigars to discuss his 15th Anniversary blend, plus Mr Jonathan challenges Cigar Nation to a chess match. Sit back, relax and light up on today's Cigar Authority!
